GameItemType.Description: While her husband was away, Queen Xiu had to crush a rebellion. Rather than leaving the matter to her personal guard, she took it upon herself to relieve each traitor of their head. It is said her tiara never stopped glowing after that episode. Those who find and wear this tiara seem to also adopt Queen Xiu hairstyle...

GameModifier.Provides: While her husband was away, Queen Xiu had to crush a rebellion. Rather than leaving the matter to her personal guard, she took it upon herself to relieve each traitor of their head. It is said her tiara never stopped glowing after that episode. Those who find and wear this tiara seem to also adopt Queen Xiu hairstyle...

GameItemType.Description: Displacer what? Okay, the boots look like they're made from jaguar skin. The wearer can teleport. But a jungle cat doing such a thing? No way.

GameModifier.Provides: Displacer what? Okay, the boots look like they're made from jaguar skin. The wearer can teleport. But a jungle cat doing such a thing? No way.

GameItemType.Description: These boots were worn by a channeler who resided over the tomb of a Titan. No one can find the tomb or its gravelord any longer, but these boots have surfaced.

GameModifier.Provides: These boots were worn by a channeler who resided over the tomb of a Titan. No one can find the tomb or its gravelord any longer, but these boots have surfaced.
::: Graveseal ::: ::: 33% Chance ::: Suffers criticals from all hits ::: Resistable

GameItemType.Description: The greatest dancer in all of Athica once wore these boots. After winning competition after competition and heart after heart, she disappeared. It's said she'd only gift the boots to a dancer with greater agility than her.

GameModifier.Provides: The greatest dancer in all of Athica once wore these boots. After winning competition after competition and heart after heart, she disappeared. It's said she'd only gift the boots to a dancer with greater agility than her.
::: Sweep ::: ::: Attack all enemies in a 1 tile radius

GameItemType.Description: For ages the secrets of the finest helmets was thought to be lost to the world. Now they have been unearthed, bringing back a marvel of protection and efficiency. This helmet has been enchanted.

GameModifier.Provides: For ages the secrets of the finest helmets was thought to be lost to the world. Now they have been unearthed, bringing back a marvel of protection and efficiency. This helmet has been enchanted.

GameItemType.Description: A design of armlets from a time long forgotten. They are a marvel of efficiency, providing unrivaled protection while remaining lighter than similar armor. These vambraces have been enchanted.

GameModifier.Provides: A design of armlets from a time long forgotten. They are a marvel of efficiency, providing unrivaled protection while remaining lighter than similar armor. These vambraces have been enchanted.

GameItemType.Description: A cuirass made from forged steel and intricately designed to provide additional protection. The design is ancient, a relic of a long-lost civilization. This cuirass has been enchanted.

GameModifier.Provides: A cuirass made from forged steel and intricately designed to provide additional protection. The design is ancient, a relic of a long-lost civilization. This cuirass has been enchanted.

GameItemType.Description: Greaves made from forged steel and intricately designed to provide additional protection while actually using lighter metals. The design is ancient, a relic of a long-lost civilization. These greaves have been enchanted.

GameModifier.Provides: Greaves made from forged steel and intricately designed to provide additional protection while actually using lighter metals. The design is ancient, a relic of a long-lost civilization. These greaves have been enchanted.

GameItemType.Description: Boots made from forged steel and intricately designed to provide additional protection while actually using lighter metals. The design is ancient; a relic of a long lost civilization. These boots have been enchanted.

GameModifier.Provides: Boots made from forged steel and intricately designed to provide additional protection while actually using lighter metals. The design is ancient; a relic of a long lost civilization. These boots have been enchanted.

GameItemType.Description: This plate helm has been augmented with magically imbued Ivory. While it doesn't provide additional protection from standard blows, it does make the wearer feel lucky. It turns out luck is a valuable commodity when protecting your head.

GameModifier.Provides: This plate helm has been augmented with magically imbued Ivory. While it doesn't provide additional protection from standard blows, it does make the wearer feel lucky. It turns out luck is a valuable commodity when protecting your head.

GameItemType.Description: These plate vambraces has been augmented with magically imbued Ivory. While it doesn't provide additional protection from standard blows, it does make the wearer feel lucky.

GameModifier.Provides: These plate vambraces has been augmented with magically imbued Ivory. While it doesn't provide additional protection from standard blows, it does make the wearer feel lucky.

GameItemType.Description: This plate cuirass has been augmented with magically imbued Ivory. While it doesn't provide additional protection from standard blows, it does make the wearer feel lucky.

GameModifier.Provides: This plate cuirass has been augmented with magically imbued Ivory. While it doesn't provide additional protection from standard blows, it does make the wearer feel lucky.

GameItemType.Description: These plate greaves has been augmented with magically imbued Ivory. While it doesn't provide additional protection from standard blows, it does make the wearer feel lucky.

GameModifier.Provides: These plate greaves has been augmented with magically imbued Ivory. While it doesn't provide additional protection from standard blows, it does make the wearer feel lucky.

GameItemType.Description: These plate boots has been augmented with magically imbued Ivory. While it doesn't provide additional protection from standard blows, it does make the wearer feel lucky.

GameModifier.Provides: These plate boots has been augmented with magically imbued Ivory. While it doesn't provide additional protection from standard blows, it does make the wearer feel lucky.

GameItemType.Description: A sturdy, lightweight helm crafted using an arachnid carapace. A clever crafter fashioned a spider-eye lens that grants a small bonus to the wearer's agility and aim. The relative toughness of arachnid chitin, however, means that some patience and magic are required to make even a single helm.

GameModifier.Provides: A sturdy, lightweight helm crafted using an arachnid carapace. A clever crafter fashioned a spider-eye lens that grants a small bonus to the wearer's agility and aim. The relative toughness of arachnid chitin, however, means that some patience and magic are required to make even a single helm.

GameItemType.Description: Sturdy, lightweight vambraces crafted using an arachnid carapace. Using empty stingers as hidden daggers, these vambraces can pierce armor. The relative toughness of arachnid chitin, however, means that some patience and magic are required to make even a single pair of these vambraces.

GameModifier.Provides: Sturdy, lightweight vambraces crafted using an arachnid carapace. Using empty stingers as hidden daggers, these vambraces can pierce armor. The relative toughness of arachnid chitin, however, means that some patience and magic are required to make even a single pair of these vambraces.
::: Armor Pierce ::: ::: Ignores 4% of the target's DEF

GameItemType.Description: A sturdy, lightweight cuirass crafted using an arachnid carapace that improves the wearer's teamwork at a slight cost to nimbleness. The relative toughness of arachnid chitin, however, means that some patience and magic are required to make even a single cuirass.

GameModifier.Provides: A sturdy, lightweight cuirass crafted using an arachnid carapace that improves the wearer's teamwork at a slight cost to nimbleness. The relative toughness of arachnid chitin, however, means that some patience and magic are required to make even a single cuirass.

GameItemType.Description: Sturdy, lightweight greaves crafted using an arachnid carapace; they are capable of deflecting a small portion of damage back to the attacker. The relative toughness of arachnid chitin, however, means that some patience and magic are required to make even a single pair of these greaves.

GameModifier.Provides: Sturdy, lightweight greaves crafted using an arachnid carapace; they are capable of deflecting a small portion of damage back to the attacker. The relative toughness of arachnid chitin, however, means that some patience and magic are required to make even a single pair of these greaves.
::: Reflection ::: ::: 4% DMG absorbed = DMG to attacker

GameItemType.Description: Sturdy, lightweight, and poison-resistant boots crafted using an arachnid carapace. The toughness of arachnid chitin, however, means that some patience and magic are required to make even a single pair of these boots.

GameModifier.Provides: Sturdy, lightweight, and poison-resistant boots crafted using an arachnid carapace. The toughness of arachnid chitin, however, means that some patience and magic are required to make even a single pair of these boots.

GameItemType.Description: The Arachnid Integument Armor doesn't require Metal nor any special proficiency to use, but it requires Crystal and additional labor.

GameModifier.Provides: The Arachnid Integument Armor doesn't require Metal nor any special proficiency to use, but it requires Crystal and additional labor.
::: Armor Pierce ::: ::: Ignores 4% of the target's DEF
::: Reflection ::: ::: 4% DMG absorbed = DMG to attacker

GameItemType.Description: A helm of arctic wolf hide made by rangers to stave off the cold in some regions. It's more of a hat or hood really. Keeps the wearer dry and warm.

GameModifier.Provides: A helm of arctic wolf hide made by rangers to stave off the cold in some regions. It's more of a hat or hood really. Keeps the wearer dry and warm.

GameItemType.Description: Arctic wolf hide mittens. Rangers prized them for warmth, rather than protection.

GameModifier.Provides: Arctic wolf hide mittens. Rangers prized them for warmth, rather than protection.

GameItemType.Description: Rangers in colder regions created cuirasses like this from bear hide. Thick and warm, these were more like coats than armor when it came to combat.

GameModifier.Provides: Rangers in colder regions created cuirasses like this from bear hide. Thick and warm, these were more like coats than armor when it came to combat.

GameItemType.Description: Ranger's greaves sewn from bear hide. They are great when it comes to staying warm and dry, but only moderately effective when it came to staying alive.

GameModifier.Provides: Ranger's greaves sewn from bear hide. They are great when it comes to staying warm and dry, but only moderately effective when it came to staying alive.

GameItemType.Description: Crafted from the hide of an arctic wolf, these boots are better for keeping warm and dry than keeping alive in combat.

GameModifier.Provides: Crafted from the hide of an arctic wolf, these boots are better for keeping warm and dry than keeping alive in combat.

GameItemType.Description: A helm made from molded leather. While it will only protect you from the lightest of blows, it will make you look stylish.

GameModifier.Provides: A helm made from molded leather. While it will only protect you from the lightest of blows, it will make you look stylish.

GameItemType.Description: Armlets made from molded leather. They may not protect you from much, but something is always better than nothing.

GameModifier.Provides: Armlets made from molded leather. They may not protect you from much, but something is always better than nothing.

GameItemType.Description: A cuirass made from molded leather. It will provide the wearer with minor protection from all types of damage.

GameModifier.Provides: A cuirass made from molded leather. It will provide the wearer with minor protection from all types of damage.

GameItemType.Description: Leather greaves provide some protection while still remaining supple enough to keep from impairing movement.

GameModifier.Provides: Leather greaves provide some protection while still remaining supple enough to keep from impairing movement.

GameItemType.Description: Boots made from molded leather. They provide the barest of foot protection.

GameModifier.Provides: Boots made from molded leather. They provide the barest of foot protection.

GameItemType.Description: This plate helm has been augmented with Ivory.

GameModifier.Provides: This plate helm has been augmented with Ivory.

GameItemType.Description: These plate vambraces has been augmented with Ivory.

GameModifier.Provides: These plate vambraces has been augmented with Ivory.

GameItemType.Description: This plate cuirass has been augmented with Ivory.

GameModifier.Provides: This plate cuirass has been augmented with Ivory.

GameItemType.Description: These plate greaves has been augmented with Ivory.

GameModifier.Provides: These plate greaves has been augmented with Ivory.

GameItemType.Description: These plate boots has been augmented with Ivory.

GameModifier.Provides: These plate boots has been augmented with Ivory.

GameItemType.Description: Altar hunters plan excursions into the northern wastes to hunt arctic wolves. These cloaks are made entirely from the corpse.

GameModifier.Provides: Altar hunters plan excursions into the northern wastes to hunt arctic wolves. These cloaks are made entirely from the corpse.

GameItemType.Description: Fast Fingers Ashley's Notes: The crossbow fires automatically when it senses danger, but the mechanism by which bolts are added is unknown; suffice to say, it never runs out.

GameModifier.Provides: Fast Fingers Ashley's Notes: The crossbow fires automatically when it senses danger, but the mechanism by which bolts are added is unknown; suffice to say, it never runs out.

GameItemType.Description: It wont melt or change shape. The wise channeler will not attempt to change this, for all who have attempted such are destroyed by this artifact of secret might.

GameModifier.Provides: It wont melt or change shape. The wise channeler will not attempt to change this, for all who have attempted such are destroyed by this artifact of secret might.

GameItemType.Description: A star forged crystal infused with the unforgiving cold of the void.

GameModifier.Provides: A star forged crystal infused with the unforgiving cold of the void.

GameItemType.Description: Though it pains the wearer when it is first put it on, in time it hurts more to remove it.

GameModifier.Provides: Though it pains the wearer when it is first put it on, in time it hurts more to remove it.

GameItemType.Description: This ring imbues the wearer's attacks with cold.

GameModifier.Provides: This ring imbues the wearer's attacks with cold.

GameItemType.Description: This tiny warrior carries within it the might of mountains and boulders.

GameModifier.Provides: This tiny warrior carries within it the might of mountains and boulders.

GameItemType.Description: A star forged crystal infused with the cruel weight of a black hole.

GameModifier.Provides: A star forged crystal infused with the cruel weight of a black hole.

GameItemType.Description: The scrawny chimneysweep Polin naively courted a noble's daughter. Laughing at him, she promised her hand in marriage only if he could defeat the retired arena champion in boxing. Polin was given one of these amulets by a mysterious traveller. Now he drinks wine each evening beside his moneyed wife.

GameModifier.Provides: The scrawny chimneysweep Polin naively courted a noble's daughter. Laughing at him, she promised her hand in marriage only if he could defeat the retired arena champion in boxing. Polin was given one of these amulets by a mysterious traveller. Now he drinks wine each evening beside his moneyed wife.

GameItemType.Description: The rock upon the ground are not mere debris. They know stories of the past, and if you wear one of these magic rings, you might hear their musings.

GameModifier.Provides: The rock upon the ground are not mere debris. They know stories of the past, and if you wear one of these magic rings, you might hear their musings.

GameItemType.Description: "Stop! The beast contained herein shall not be set free, not even by you!" -Tyrael

GameModifier.Provides: "Stop! The beast contained herein shall not be set free, not even by you!" -Tyrael

GameItemType.Description: A star forged crystal infused with the rage of a star's furnace.

GameModifier.Provides: A star forged crystal infused with the rage of a star's furnace.

GameItemType.Description: When it is worn even the wearer's caress burns those he or she touches. Although some see this as a weapon, the Quendar are known to use it for pleasure.

GameModifier.Provides: When it is worn even the wearer's caress burns those he or she touches. Although some see this as a weapon, the Quendar are known to use it for pleasure.

GameItemType.Description: This ring imbues the wearer's attacks with fire.

GameModifier.Provides: This ring imbues the wearer's attacks with fire.

GameItemType.Description: No mere walking stick, it has been taken deep into clouds and seen journeys beyond the heavens.

GameModifier.Provides: No mere walking stick, it has been taken deep into clouds and seen journeys beyond the heavens.

GameItemType.Description: A star forged crystal infused with the furious charge of a gas giant's storms.

GameModifier.Provides: A star forged crystal infused with the furious charge of a gas giant's storms.

GameItemType.Description: These are a redesign of the wards worn by King Granda's men. A mere fifty mortal men, each with these amulets, fought the Kurisha tribe of Yatra Nata Juggernauts in the Umbran wastes. Though they died to the last man, the Kurisha devils never again threatened the kingdoms of men.

GameModifier.Provides: These are a redesign of the wards worn by King Granda's men. A mere fifty mortal men, each with these amulets, fought the Kurisha tribe of Yatra Nata Juggernauts in the Umbran wastes. Though they died to the last man, the Kurisha devils never again threatened the kingdoms of men.

GameItemType.Description: This ring imbues the wearer's attacks with lightning.

GameModifier.Provides: This ring imbues the wearer's attacks with lightning.

GameItemType.Description: Wear this and you shall always outmaneuver your foes. Where they see walls, you shall see opportunity. Yet where other feel love and compassion, you wil see only weakness. With this ring upon your finger, you shall rule utterly alone.

GameModifier.Provides: Wear this and you shall always outmaneuver your foes. Where they see walls, you shall see opportunity. Yet where other feel love and compassion, you wil see only weakness. With this ring upon your finger, you shall rule utterly alone.

GameItemType.Description: "The tortoise is slow, but he who strides incessantly steps first upon the battlefield, and strikes decisively before the capricious hare even knows to sprint."

GameModifier.Provides: "The tortoise is slow, but he who strides incessantly steps first upon the battlefield, and strikes decisively before the capricious hare even knows to sprint."

GameItemType.Description: "What use are training yards or captains when the spirit of Elemental will reach out and command the best from any soldier?" -Queen Procipinee

GameModifier.Provides: "What use are training yards or captains when the spirit of Elemental will reach out and command the best from any soldier?" -Queen Procipinee

GameItemType.Description: This belt is also known as the Belt of the Wind, the Mancer Belt or the Dancer's Girdle. No matter the name its impact on the wearer is unquestionable, their reactions and effectiveness in combat is increased.

GameModifier.Provides: This belt is also known as the Belt of the Wind, the Mancer Belt or the Dancer's Girdle. No matter the name its impact on the wearer is unquestionable, their reactions and effectiveness in combat is increased.

GameItemType.Description: This magical amulet will increase the wearer's defense.

GameModifier.Provides: This magical amulet will increase the wearer's defense.

GameItemType.Description: Mimbly's Amulet increases defense... without the work.

GameModifier.Provides: Mimbly's Amulet increases defense without..the work.

GameItemType.Description: This necklace increases the wearer's sight range.

GameModifier.Provides: This necklace increases the wearer's sight range.

GameItemType.Description: This backpack will make its wearer a master healer, but leave them too busy to do much fighting.

GameModifier.Provides: This backpack will make its wearer a master healer, but leave them too busy to do much fighting.

GameItemType.Description: This backpack will make its wearer a capable battlefield medic. Just remind the soldiers it can do nothing for gonorrhoea.

GameModifier.Provides: This backpack will make its wearer a capable battlefield medic. Just remind the soldiers it can do nothing for gonorrhoea.

GameItemType.Description: When equipped, unit can cast Obliterate Roads and Primitive Roads.

GameModifier.Provides: When equipped, unit can cast Obliterate Roads and Primitive Roads.

GameItemType.Description: "The men even listened to Bacco Aurelia Lamord, until he lost the banner to gambling" -Knight of Calder.

GameModifier.Provides: "The men even listened to Bacco Aurelia Lamord, until he lost the banner to gambling" -Knight of Calder.
::: Banner of Leadership ::: ::: Target goes next

GameItemType.Description: In great High Pointe, those most dedicated to Air will send long hours exposed to wind without clothing. Some, after reaching enlightenment in those winds, will weave banners like this one. Others are forever mute, while some even commit suicide.

GameModifier.Provides: In great High Pointe, those most dedicated to Air will send long hours exposed to wind without clothing. Some, after reaching enlightenment in those winds, will weave banners like this one. Others are forever mute, while some even commit suicide.

GameItemType.Description: Men and women were drawn to Tar-Thela, the Emerald Sorceress, for her unequaled beauty, but there was more at work than simply aesthetics in her ability to seduce others.

GameModifier.Provides: Men and women were drawn to Tar-Thela, the Emerald Sorceress, for her unequaled beauty, but there was more at work than simply aesthetics in her ability to seduce others.
::: Allure ::: ::: Charm a Trained Unit ::: Resistable

GameItemType.Description: Those who survive battles where this banner was held aloft often become skilled warriors or fabled heroes.

GameModifier.Provides: Those who survive battles where this banner was held aloft often become skilled warriors or fabled heroes.

GameItemType.Description: Turtlers, as they call themselves, are drilled to protect, by any means necessary, other soldiers.

GameModifier.Provides: Turtlers, as they call themselves, are drilled to protect, by any means necessary, other soldiers.

GameItemType.Description: Rumors abound about the fate of a squad of skirmishers sent by Moria to destroy an outpost of the Order of the Wombat on the darkest night of the year. It is said they found the soldiers of the order in formation and quite ready for the attack. It's also said the squad never returned and Moria has left the order and the outpost untroubled since then.

GameModifier.Provides: Rumors abound about the fate of a squad of skirmishers sent by Moria to destroy an outpost of the Order of the Wombat on the darkest night of the year. It is said they found the soldiers of the order in formation and quite ready for the attack. It's also said the squad never returned and Moria has left the order and the outpost untroubled since then.
::: Hold the Line ::: ::: 1st Action ::: Defending when attacked (Trained Units)

GameItemType.Description: It seems to be gold-laced and it's given to soldiers who've mastered the three main commandments found in Marching by Vergaxa, namely: discipline, discipline, and discipline. The magic lock makes it hard to remove for common soldiers although it usually comes off when the head is severed from the body.

GameModifier.Provides: It seems to be gold-laced and it's given to soldiers who've mastered the three main commandments found in Marching by Vergaxa, namely: discipline, discipline, and discipline. The magic lock makes it hard to remove for common soldiers although it usually comes off when the head is separated from the body.

GameItemType.Description: "Scowlin' Bloodbeard wanted his own pirate ship, aye, and thus, he gave those enchanted gorgets to a few buccaneers. They killed the captain, aye, they also sank the ship." -Diary of Wally No-Eyes

GameModifier.Provides: "Scowlin' Bloodbeard wanted his own pirate ship, aye, and thus, he gave those enchanted gorgets to a few buccaneers. They killed the captain, aye, they also sank the ship." -Diary of Wally No-Eyes
::: +2 ATK vs Sovereigns ::: Unless user is a Sovereign

GameItemType.Description: There glands are often called cursed - those that sought to claim them and carry them to market for a hefty price are sometimes never seen again. Take care that it does not rupture in your pack, or it may prove more curse than tool.

GameModifier.Provides: There glands are often called cursed - those that sought to claim them and carry them to market for a hefty price are sometimes never seen again. Take care that it does not rupture in your pack, or it may prove more curse than tool.

GameItemType.Description: The Naja's venom makes your weapons a terrible threat, even to confident armored troops. Weapons treated with this poison grow dull and brittle very quickly.

GameModifier.Provides: The Naja's venom makes your weapons a terrible threat, even to confident armored troops. Weapons treated with this poison grow dull and brittle very quickly.

GameItemType.Description: The Ophidian glands gives your weapons the numbing effect of the creature's bite. Rumor has it the wealthy youth of Antheros would drink this venom for recreation.

GameModifier.Provides: The Ophidian gland gives your weapons the numbing effect of the creature's bite. Rumor has it the wealthy youth of Antheros would drink this venom for recreation.

::: Numbness or Euphoria ::: ::: 33% Chance ::: 0 Counterattack ::: Resistable
::: 33% Chance ::: Lose Next Turn ::: Resistable

GameItemType.Description: The Ophidian glands gives your weapons the numbing effect of the creature's bite. Rumor has it the wealthy youth of Antheros would drink this venom for recreation.

GameModifier.Provides: The Ophidian gland gives your weapons the numbing effect of the creature's bite. Rumor has it the wealthy youth of Antheros would drink this venom for recreation.

::: Numbness or Euphoria ::: ::: 33% Chance ::: 0 Counterattack ::: Resistable
::: 33% Chance ::: Lose Next Turn ::: Resistable

GameItemType.Description: Plaguestalkers bite carries a virulent disease that can weaken and sometimes kill their prey. Assassins have been known to use them to great effect, hiding murder as illness.

GameModifier.Provides: Plaguestalkers bite carries a virulent disease that can weaken and sometimes kill their prey. Assassins have been known to use them to great effect, hiding murder as illness.
::: Virulence ::: ::: +Diseased ::: ::: -1 Regeneration per Action ::: ::: -25% Regeneration per Season ::: ::: Resistable ::: Counts as an Injury
::: Virulence (Self) ::: ::: 1/300 Chance (0.33%) ::: +Diseased ::: ::: -1 Regeneration per Action ::: ::: -25% Regeneration per Season ::: Counts as an Injury

GameItemType.Description: This magical amulet will improve the wearer's health.

GameModifier.Provides: This magical amulet will improve the wearer's health.

GameItemType.Description: A warlock of lightning would deliver this as a gift to enemies, before attacking them.

GameModifier.Provides: A warlock of lightning would deliver this as a gift to enemies, before attacking them.
::: Gaian Idol ::: ::: +1 Earth Power ::: Must be cast by Sovereign ::: Only works once

GameItemType.Description: An obscure account insists that while holding this Idol, an ashwake dragon can understand the speech of the bearer. Unfortunately the dragon may still swallow those it understands.

GameModifier.Provides: An obscure account insists that while holding this Idol, an ashwake dragon can understand the speech of the bearer. Unfortunately the dragon may still swallow those it understands.
::: Pyromancer Idol ::: ::: +1 Fire Power ::: Must be cast by Sovereign ::: Only works once

GameItemType.Description: Renara the rainmaker held this idol and called the rains. After a week of celebration, she was begged to make it stop. When she could not, she was hung for killing the crops in a flood.

GameModifier.Provides: Renara the rainmaker held this idol and called the rains. After a week of celebration, she was begged to make it stop. When she could not, she was hung for killing the crops in a flood.
::: Rainmaker Idol ::: ::: +1 Water Power ::: Must be cast by Sovereign ::: Only works once

GameItemType.Description: A famous thief escaped certain copulation at sword-point with an Urxen princess by tossing this into her bath.

GameModifier.Provides: A famous thief escaped certain copulation at sword-point with an Urxen princess by tossing this into her bath.
::: Wind Whisperer Idol ::: ::: +1 Air Power ::: Must be cast by Sovereign ::: Only works once

GameItemType.Description: Diabolist Idol.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: Diabolist Idol ::: ::: +1 Death Power ::: Must be cast by Sovereign ::: Only works once

GameItemType.Description: Hedonist Idol.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: Hedonist Idol ::: ::: +1 Life Power ::: Must be cast by Sovereign ::: Only works once

GameItemType.Description: Veteran Idol.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: Veteran Idol ::: ::: +1 Battle Power ::: Must be cast by Sovereign ::: Only works once

GameItemType.Description: Feral Idol.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: Feral Idol ::: ::: +1 Beast Power ::: Must be cast by Sovereign ::: Only works once

GameItemType.Description: Druid Idol.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: Druid Idol ::: ::: +1 Nature Power ::: Must be cast by Sovereign ::: Only works once

GameItemType.Description: Shadowcaster Idol.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: Shadowcaster Idol ::: ::: +1 Shadow Power ::: Must be cast by Sovereign ::: Only works once

GameItemType.Description: Air Shrill mandibles are potent magical reagents; practicing alchemists and wizards will pay top Gildar for them.

GameModifier.Provides: Air Shrills mandibles are potent magical reagents; practicing alchemists and wizards will pay top Gildar for them.

GameItemType.Description: Earth Shrill mandibles are potent magical reagents; practicing alchemists and wizards will pay top Gildar for them.

GameModifier.Provides: Earth Shrills mandibles are potent magical reagents; practicing alchemists and wizards will pay top Gildar for them.

GameItemType.Description: Fire Shrill mandibles are potent magical reagents; practicing alchemists and wizards will pay top Gildar for them.

GameModifier.Provides: Fire Shrills mandibles are potent magical reagents; practicing alchemists and wizards will pay top Gildar for them.
::: Armor Pierce ::: ::: Ignores 5% of the target's DEF

GameItemType.Description: Ice Shrills mandibles are potent magical reagents; practicing alchemists and wizards will pay top gildar for them.

GameModifier.Provides: Ice Shrills mandibles are potent magical reagents; practicing alchemists and wizards will pay top gildar for them.

GameItemType.Description: Water Shrill mandibles are potent magical reagents; practicing alchemists and wizards will pay top Gildar for them.

GameModifier.Provides: Water Shrills mandibles are potent magical reagents; practicing alchemists and wizards will pay top Gildar for them.

GameItemType.Description: Umberdroth plates are highly valued by merchants and can be exchanged for a good amount of Gildar. You may also use them to improve your armor although they are pretty heavy.

GameModifier.Provides: Umberdroth plates are highly valued by merchants and can be exchanged for a good amount of Gildar. You may also use them to improve your armor although they are pretty heavy.

GameItemType.Description: Giant Albino Rock Spider are protected by plates larger and thicker than those of normal Rock Spiders, which makes it easier to extract usable material from them.

GameModifier.Provides: Giant Albino Rock Spider are protected by plates larger and thicker than those of normal Rock Spiders, which makes it easier to extract usable material from them.

GameItemType.Description: Albino Rock Spider are protected by plates larger and thicker than those of normal Rock Spiders, which makes it easier to extract usable material from them.

GameModifier.Provides: Albino Rock Spider are protected by plates larger and thicker than those of normal Rock Spiders, which makes it easier to extract usable material from them.

GameItemType.Description: The armored plates of these spiders are highly valued and can be used to reinforced your armor; more than one adventurer has made a small fortune trading them.

GameModifier.Provides: The armored plates of these spiders are highly valued and can be used to reinforced your armor; more than one adventurer has made a small fortune trading them.

GameItemType.Description: The armored plates of the Rock Spiders have a great many uses, among which reinforcing your armor, and can often by traded for Gildar or other objects of value.

GameModifier.Provides: The armored plates of the Rock Spiders have a great many uses, among which reinforcing your armor, and can often by traded for Gildar or other objects of value.

GameItemType.Description: Mechanically adept and magically enchanted, these pliers can re-fit any suit of armor to any user, making anyone fit to wear armor.

GameModifier.Provides: Mechanically adept and magically enchanted, these pliers can re-fit any suit of armor to any user, making anyone fit to wear armor.
::: +2 Armor Proficiency ::: Can wear all types of Armor

GameItemType.Description: Invented by a channeler who had to ferry his daughter past attacking Urxen to reach her salvation. He fell to save her, but the armor she wore held back the poison darts.

GameModifier.Provides: Invented by a channeler who had to ferry his daughter past attacking Urxen to reach her salvation. He fell to save her, but the armor she wore held back the poison darts.
::: +1 Armor Proficiency ::: Can wear Chain if limited to Leather ::: Can wear Plate if limited to Chain

GameItemType.Description: Smooth on its edges, but sharp as a razor against its edges. Take care slipping this on.

GameModifier.Provides: Smooth on its edges, but sharp as a razor against its edges. Take care slipping this on.

GameItemType.Description: When slipped on, the wearer can hear distant thunder missed by mortal ears, and feel the winds always moving beyond the notice of common senses.

GameModifier.Provides: When slipped on, the wearer can hear distant thunder missed by mortal ears, and feel the winds always moving beyond the notice of common senses.

GameItemType.Description: The bearer of this ring cannot help but laugh at plans. Designs are a cage to them, and the wearer lusts to scream and charge into battle recklessly.

GameModifier.Provides: The bearer of this ring cannot help but laugh at plans. Designs are a cage to them, and the wearer lusts to scream and charge into battle recklessly.

GameItemType.Description: The living must keep their mind upon the passing hour while wearing this ring: if not removed after battle, its gift of death kills the finger, and then the hand, and finally the wearer in total.

GameModifier.Provides: The living must keep their mind upon the passing hour while wearing this ring: if not removed after battle, its gift of death kills the finger, and then the hand, and finally the wearer in total.

GameItemType.Description: The sorcerer Arganis donned this ring, and took to lounging in pits of mud and clay. Strong forged metals and proud mountains seduced his thoughts, until one day he had vanished, only this ring to be found in the clay field behind his tower.

GameModifier.Provides: The sorcerer Arganis donned this ring, and took to lounging in pits of mud and clay. Strong forged metals and proud mountains seduced his thoughts, until one day he had vanished, only this ring to be found in the clay field behind his tower.

GameItemType.Description: This ring knows the truth. All things are illusion, shadow-forms meant to hide the essence within. That essence is passion, hungry and furious. Only when that passion is released as flame does the world regain meaning.

GameModifier.Provides: This ring knows the truth. All things are illusion, shadow-forms meant to hide the essence within. That essence is passion, hungry and furious. Only when that passion is released as flame does the world regain meaning.

GameItemType.Description: For all bearers, except the Quendar, the ring burns the skin beneath when worn, leaving a permanent mark of its use.

GameModifier.Provides: For all bearers, except the Quendar, the ring burns the skin beneath when worn, leaving a permanent mark of its use.

GameItemType.Description: Once a proud king sought this ring, searching the world for it and exhausting his fortune. He knew of its life-giving properties, hoping to revive his dying son. Years after the son's death, the king found the ring and bought it for a single coin. In bitterness, the king threw it down a well. All who drank from that well were cured of all disease, for years to follow.

GameModifier.Provides: Once a proud king sought this ring, searching the world for it and exhausting his fortune. He knew of its life-giving properties, hoping to revive his dying son. Years after the son's death, the king found the ring and bought it for a single coin. In bitterness, the king threw it down a well. All who drank from that well were cured of all disease, for years to follow.

GameItemType.Description: Those who take this ring upon their hands are calmed, though their heart races. All things become lines moving forward and backward in time, and the wearer's mind knows only calculating circumstances to peace under law.

GameModifier.Provides: Those who take this ring upon their hands are calmed, though their heart races. All things become lines moving forward and backward in time, and the wearer's mind knows only calculating circumstances to peace under law.

GameItemType.Description: This ring's bearer cannot help but sob, when first they don it. But after the streams of sadness run dry, the wearer can tune to the melody of water in themselves, the air, and in oceans worlds away, as if the world was made only of willing musical instruments.

GameModifier.Provides: This ring's bearer cannot help but sob, when first they don it. But after the streams of sadness run dry, the wearer can tune to the melody of water in themselves, the air, and in oceans worlds away, as if the world was made only of willing musical instruments.

GameItemType.Description: The magician Vatula is said to have studied the physical properties of acceleration and gravitational vectors using one of these stones. Afterwards, he just wasn't quite right in the head.

GameModifier.Provides: The magician Vatula is said to have studied the physical properties of acceleration and gravitational vectors using one of these stones. Afterwards, he just wasn't quite right in the head.

GameItemType.Description: Crafted by an undead Lich, this stone was used to milk prisoners of their blood over long periods. Interestingly, it also preserves corpses when left in a tomb.

GameModifier.Provides: Crafted by an undead Lich, this stone was used to milk prisoners of their blood over long periods. Interestingly, it also preserves corpses when left in a tomb.

GameItemType.Description: This stone can be tuned to send out powerful vibrations and shatter iron or bone. A channeler's wife crafted a version that exuded mild vibrations. It was useless in battle, leaving her husband to question its design.

GameModifier.Provides: This stone can be tuned to send out powerful vibrations and shatter iron or bone. A channeler's wife crafted a version that exuded mild vibrations. It was useless in battle, leaving her husband to question its design.

GameItemType.Description: The Quendar have a ritual where their young grip this stone from a bed of hot coals. If they maintain their grip on it while it sears their flesh then they are accepted as an adult among their people.

GameModifier.Provides: The Quendar have a ritual where their young grip this stone from a bed of hot coals. If they maintain their grip on it while it sears their flesh then they are accepted as an adult among their people.

GameItemType.Description: Originally crafted by a mighty king who wanted his monuments to last an eternity. Alas, the stones were needed in war, and now those monuments have been buried by sandstorms and forgotten.

GameModifier.Provides: Originally crafted by a mighty king who wanted his monuments to last an eternity. Alas, the stones were needed in war, and now those monuments have been buried by sandstorms and forgotten.

GameItemType.Description: A thief used several of these stones to hide gold behind a rock wall. Alas, his treacherous partners ripped them from his neck in the middle of the act, entombing the thief's arm in stone.

GameModifier.Provides: A thief used several of these stones to hide gold behind a rock wall. Alas, his treacherous partners ripped them from his neck in the middle of the act, entombing the thief's arm in stone.

GameItemType.Description: Use this tent to keep your army well-rested and ready for the next battle. Just don't let that bed-wetter Bacco inside!

GameModifier.Provides: Use this tent to keep your army well-rested and ready for the next battle. Just don't let that bed-wetter Bacco inside!

GameItemType.Description: It's not just for artisanal quinoa-sucking hipsters! Your army can get a good night's rest in one of these.

GameModifier.Provides: It's not just for artisanal quinoa-sucking hipsters! Your army can get a good night's rest in one of these.

GameItemType.Description: It's better than sleeping on rocks.

GameModifier.Provides: It's better than sleeping on rocks.

GameItemType.Description: When it's not in use, this miniature fits in your pocket, but upon activation, the Astral Forge grows full-scale. Of note, there's an irksome ethereal being spawning with it - Draginol, it says its name is - which keeps pestering you about creating the Orb of Dominion.

GameModifier.Provides: When it's not in use, this miniature fits in your pocket, but upon activation, the Astral Forge grows full-scale. Of note, there's an irksome ethereal being spawning with it - Draginol, it says its name is - which keeps pestering you about creating the Orb of Dominion.

GameItemType.Description: The last man who equipped these was left forever shamed.

GameModifier.Provides: The last man who equipped these was left forever shamed.

GameItemType.Description: "A big missile-shaped boulder. Can be used to hurt feelings." -Ogre Foreman

GameModifier.Provides: "A big missile-shaped boulder. Can be used to hurt feelings." -Ogre Foreman
::: Hurl Boulder (Pierce) ::: ::: (8 + Earth Shards) DMG ::: Caster TroopCount Multiplier ::: Earth Multiplier ::: Time Bonus (Sov)

GameItemType.Description: Those who hold this eye cannot be betrayed. But it is said they come to distrust their closest friends, and are left feeling perpetually alone.

GameModifier.Provides: Those who hold this eye cannot be betrayed. But it is said they come to distrust their closest friends, and are left feeling perpetually alone.

GameItemType.Description: Those who carry and ring this bell are said to have news of their deeds spread around the world by the very wind itself. It certainly makes the ringer a hard person to forget, even beyond the bounds of their homeland.

GameModifier.Provides: Those who carry and ring this bell are said to have news of their deeds spread around the world by the very wind itself. It certainly makes the ringer a hard person to forget, even beyond the bounds of their homeland.

GameItemType.Description: Said to be an eye of the Titan Kir-Tion, it allows you to view the world in all its splendor.

GameModifier.Provides: Said to be an eye of the Titan Kir-Tion, it allows you to view the world in all its splendor.

GameItemType.Description: Despite its potent effect, those who are revived sometimes find their appetite for flesh greatly increased.

GameModifier.Provides: Despite its potent effect, those who are revived sometimes find their appetite for flesh greatly increased.
::: Revivification ::: ::: 80% Chance ::: If killed, resurrected w/ 50% HP. Once.

GameItemType.Description: A valuable teaching tool for soldiers. Take care, however, for it is said that if a dummy absorbs too much hate and aggression, it may come to life and seek out those who abused it.

GameModifier.Provides: A valuable teaching tool for soldiers. Take care, however, for it is said that if a dummy absorbs too much hate and aggression, it may come to life and seek out those who abused it.

GameItemType.Description: Bearing this relic makes one inexplicably charismatic and pleasing to look at.

GameModifier.Provides: Bearing this relic makes one inexplicably charismatic and pleasing to look at.
::: Sticky Tongue ::: ::: Silenced for one Action ::: -1 Move ::: -10% Accuracy ::: -10% Defense ::: -10% Dodge ::: -10% Dodge against Ranged ::: -10% Initiative ::: -50% Death\Poison Resistance

GameItemType.Description: The book describes in details how populations evolve over the course of generations through a process of natural selection. It clearly indicates that amphibians and mammals, while having a common ancestors at some point in time, have been evolving differently since then, noting that no such thing as a Frogboy would be possible. Unless Titans got involved.

GameModifier.Provides: The book describes in details how populations evolve over the course of generations through a process of natural selection. It clearly indicates that amphibians and mammals, while having a common ancestors at some point in time, have been evolving differently since then, noting that no such thing as a Frogboy would be possible. Unless Titans got involved.
::: Zoologist Call ::: ::: Can Summon a random Beast

GameItemType.Description: Hold this boar, and you won't want for money.

GameModifier.Provides: Hold this boar, and you won't want for money.
::: Prosperity ::: ::: +1.5 Gildar per Essence per Season ::: City Enchantment

GameItemType.Description: The spirit of a stubborn, fierce boar is contained within. The nun of Varcalel is said to have won a bar room brawl with one of these.

GameModifier.Provides: The spirit of a stubborn, fierce boar is contained within. The nun of Varcalel is said to have won a bar room brawl with one of these.
::: Boar Charge ::: ::: For 1 Action ::: ::: -5 Dodge ::: ::: +2 ATK ::: ::: +2 DEF ::: GoNext

GameItemType.Description: Once used by a dancer to become world famous, holding this object makes your movements as fluid and quick as you desire.

GameModifier.Provides: Once used by a dancer to become world famous, holding this object makes your movements as fluid and quick as you desire.

GameItemType.Description: Obey.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: Whip of Submission ::: ::: Normal ATK + Knock Prone ::: 1x3 Area ::: Resistable

GameItemType.Description: "We, mortals, are but shadows and dust. Shadows and dust!" -Proximus.

GameModifier.Provides: We, mortals, are but shadows and dust. Shadows and dust!" -Proximus.
::: Gladiator ::: ::: Can duel with enemy Champions ::: Done automatically ::: Melee only
::: Duelist I ::: ::: Duelists alternate while dueling ::: May lose several actions after a duel
::: LH 2.0 new Tactical AI makes dueling almost impossible.
